docBody.p: Help for the childless couple has been one the research projects in the National & International Planned Parenthood Movement, ever in this country as well as in England since the Movement began. It is interesting to note that both Fertility & Infertility Research had little attention by either the Medical or Scientific specialists until fairly recently. Today they seem to parallel each other in a race to meet the demands of our growing intelligent public. The term Birth Control used in the Early days of the PP movement signified its principle of Control -- (not limitation) of the birth rate by wanting to space their pregnancies & to encourage & help childless women to become mothers.
